7 Dr.S.Victor Asst. Professor / Head-MBA, AURCT Member
8 Dr.M.Subramanian Asst. Professor / Head-S&H, AURCT Member
9 Mrs.G.Devi Asst. Professor / Student Affiars, AURCT Member
10 Dr.M.Gunaseran Deputy Warden,Pothigai Boys Hostel, AURCT Member
11 Ms.Vinolia Anandan Deputy Warden,Thamirabharani Girls Hostel, AURCT Member
